meanings.sent1: The toy crocodile had a gavialoid snout.

meanings.sent5: The gavialoid clouds in the sky looked like giant reptiles floating above.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the gavial family.
meanings.sent1: The zookeeper studied the gavialoid behavior of the reptiles.
meanings.sent2: The gavialoid habitat was carefully designed to mimic their natural environment.
meanings.sent3: The gavialoid family reunion at the zoo was a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed through the gavialoid landscape, home to many unique species.
meanings.sent5: The gavialoid markings on the eggs helped camouflage them from predators.
